title: GenerateBindingRedirects touches the app.config at each build
body:
The code seems to confirm my theory:
https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/6851538897f5d7b08024a6d8435bc44be5869e53/src/Tasks/AssemblyDependency/GenerateBindingRedirects.cs#L132-L135

nodes.body: I first thought it was forcing a recompilation but it only forces the copy in the output directory. This seems very minor.
